name: Chloroblast
description:
Houseplants are left in a dinky apartment by their neglectful owner. Fight for your spot in the sunlight and your survival against your friends or enemies.

Up to 4 players can compete in this arena shooter!

Controls

  • USB Controller: D-Pad + A
  • Keyboard 1: WASD + Space
  • Keyboard 2: Arrow Keys + ctrl
